about_section.title: Drive Innovation with a Partner You can Trust
about_section.description: At SmachStack, we’re a global technology partner empowering businesses across North America, Europe, and beyond with future-ready solutions in web development, mobile applications, AI, and embedded systems. With a team averaging over 10 years of experience—including top AI specialists and DevOps architects—we bring precision to projects ranging from safety-critical systems to scalable enterprise platforms. Strategically located in Canada, the UK, and Pakistan, our globally connected teams combine technical mastery with a client-first approach, delivering technology that solves complex challenges while driving growth. Let’s build what’s next—together.

case_studies_hero.title: Case Studies
case_studies_hero.description: Discover how our technology solutions have propelled businesses to new heights. Through collaboration, innovation, and a tailored approach, we’ve helped our clients overcome complex challenges, streamline operations, and unlock new opportunities for growth.

case_study_cards.title: Empowering Sci Tech with Laboratory Information Management Systems
case_study_cards.description: quattro research GmbH, a leading provider of Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS) for the life sciences, pharmaceutical, and chemical industries, sought to enhance its software development capabilities to meet growing client demands.
case_study_cards.aboutClient: quattro research GmbH, a Leading provider of Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS) for the life sciences, pharmaceutical, and chemical industries
case_study_cards.content:
## 🧪 Project Overview

Established in **2004**, **quattro research** specializes in developing intuitive software solutions that support the digitalization of scientific workflows. Their LIMS, including **quattro/CM**, **quattro/LJ**, and **quattro/BR**, are designed to manage and analyze chemical and biological data effectively.

Facing increased demand for their solutions, quattro research needed to scale their development team rapidly without compromising on quality. They turned to **unicrew** to augment their in-house team with skilled developers who could seamlessly integrate and contribute to ongoing projects.

---

## 🚧 Challenge

- **Scalability Needs**: quattro research required additional development resources to accelerate product delivery timelines and support the expansion of functionality in innovative Laboratory Information Management Systems.
- **User Interface Complexity**: Implementing a robust and responsive UI capable of managing large chemical molecule data sets in a user-friendly way.
- **Scientific Data Presentation**: Developing a flexible framework to display complex scientific information in customizable grids and forms.
- **Security Infrastructure**: Ensuring secure access management with modern authentication protocols.
- **Visualization Capabilities**: Delivering high-performance visualization for large molecule structures.

---

## ✅ Solution

### 01. React-Based UI

Implemented a scalable, user-centric React interface to manage extensive chemical molecule data.

### 02. Configurable Framework

Built a dynamic Laboratory Information Management System to display scientific information through customizable grids and forms.

### 03. Secure Authentication

Integrated OAuth and JWT-based authentication and authorization mechanisms for LIMS robust security.

### 04. Molecule Visualization Services

Delivered advanced visualization tools enabling clear, performant rendering of large molecule structures.

---

## 👨‍💻 Development Approach

unicrew assembled a **cross-functional team** of seasoned developers with deep expertise in:

- `.NET`, `Java`, `PHP`, `Laravel`
- `JavaScript`, `React`, `Vue`

The team worked in close collaboration with quattro research’s internal engineers, following **agile best practices** to ensure alignment and consistent delivery.

---

## 🧩 Key Aspects of the LIMS Solution

### 🔹 React-Based UI

unicrew designed and implemented a modern, highly responsive React-based user interface. The UI was engineered specifically to handle the complexity and scale of large chemical molecule data, ensuring optimal performance and an intuitive user experience.

### 🔹 Configurable Scientific Data Framework

unicrew built a **flexible and extensible framework** for displaying scientific information. The system allowed users to configure how data is presented through **dynamic grids and forms**, enabling precise control over data visualization and interaction.

### 🔹 Advanced Authentication and Authorization

Security was a top priority. unicrew implemented robust mechanisms using **OAuth** and **JWT** to ensure secure user access and modern identity management compatibility.

### 🔹 Molecule Visualization Services

Developed **high-performance visualization tools** to efficiently render and manipulate large molecule structures. This empowered users to visually explore complex chemical data and enhance decision-making.

---

> "**unicrew's developers integrated seamlessly with our team, demonstrating professionalism and a deep understanding of our needs. Their contributions have been invaluable in accelerating our development processes.**"  
> — **Dr. Bernhard Schirm**, Managing Director

[Check full review](#)

---

## 🧰 Related Services

- Dedicated Software Development Team  
- White Label Web Development  
- Legacy Software Modernization  

---

## 🏁 Result

- **Increased Development Velocity**: Faster delivery of LIMS key features with unicrew’s integration.
- **Enhanced Usability**: A modern React-based UI for easier interaction with molecular data.
- **Scientific Insight Optimization**: Configurable grids/forms allowed precise data manipulation.
- **Improved Security and Access Control**: OAuth and JWT strengthened authentication infrastructure.
- **Superior Visualization**: Enhanced clarity for users handling complex molecular structures.
- **Sustained Collaboration**: A strong ongoing partnership enabling quattro research to evolve confidently.

case_study_cards.title: Cloud Migration of Booking Platform for Hotels and Hotel Networks
case_study_cards.description: By leveraging unicrew’s expertise, the client successfully addressed their challenges and achieved their objectives, emerging as a more cost-efficient, reliable, and scalable platform for hotel bookings.

case_study_cards.title: Development of hybrid events software
case_study_cards.description: Our client - meta-fusion GmbH, a company supporting the hybrid meetings and digital processing of congresses and conferences for 18 years, disrupted the market with the Digital-Congress-Resources Suit (DCR Suit)
case_study_cards.content:
## 🧪 Project Overview

![quattro research logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Logo_placeholder_image.png/600px-Logo_placeholder_image.png)

Founded in **2004**, **quattro research** develops intuitive software that empowers digital scientific workflows. Their **Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS)** — such as **quattro/CM**, **quattro/LJ**, and **quattro/BR** — manage and analyze complex chemical and biological data.

---

![Team Collaboration](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1632179002215-f5c8d5dcf35b)

To scale quickly and meet growing client demand, quattro research partnered with **unicrew** to strengthen their engineering team with skilled developers who could integrate seamlessly and boost project velocity.

---

## 🚧 Key Challenges

![Challenges](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1573164713347-df1e1f69a3f2)

- **Scalability Requirements** – Needed to scale fast without lowering code quality.
- **Complex UI Needs** – Required a responsive UI for large molecular datasets.
- **Scientific Data Presentation** – Flexible visualization in dynamic grids and forms.
- **Modern Security Protocols** – Needed secure access management (OAuth, JWT).
- **High-Performance Rendering** – For complex molecule structure visualization.

---

## ✅ Solution

### 🔹 React-Based UI

![React UI](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581091012184-5c2bca6f3bb6)

Designed and implemented a performant, intuitive React frontend for handling complex molecule data structures.

---

### 🔹 Configurable Data Framework

![Grid System](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1645051915681-183d5f30ef0a)

Developed a flexible framework allowing scientists to customize data views using dynamic **grids** and **forms**.

---

### 🔹 Secure Authentication

![Security](https://unicrew.com/wp-content/uploads/hybrid2-min.png)

Integrated **OAuth** and **JWT** for robust and modern authentication & authorization standards.

---

### 🔹 Molecule Visualization

![Molecule Viewer](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/bd/Caffeine_3D_ball.png/640px-Caffeine_3D_ball.png)

Delivered advanced visualization tools for rendering large and complex molecule structures efficiently.

---

## 👥 Collaboration Snapshot

![Unicrew Team](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581091870622-df42a3f9808b)

**unicrew** assembled a full-stack development team with expertise in:
- `.NET`, `Java`, `PHP`, `Laravel`
- `JavaScript`, `React`, `Vue`

They worked in **agile sprints** alongside quattro research’s internal team to maintain alignment, speed, and flexibility.

---

## 🎯 Results

![Success](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581093588401-99a6f43db2a9)

- **⚡ Faster Development** – Accelerated product delivery timelines.
- **🎨 Better Usability** – UI tailored for scientific users.
- **🔐 Improved Security** – OAuth and JWT integration.
- **🔬 Enhanced Visualization** – Clarity in molecule data exploration.
- **🤝 Ongoing Partnership** – Sustained collaboration with quattro research.

---

> _"unicrew's developers integrated seamlessly with our team, demonstrating professionalism and a deep understanding of our needs. Their contributions have been invaluable."_  
> — **Dr. Bernhard Schirm**, Managing Director

[🔗 View Full Review](https://example.com/review)

---

## 🛠 Related Services

- ✅ Dedicated Software Development Teams  
- ✅ White Label Web Development  
- ✅ Legacy Software Modernization

news_items.content:
## 🧪 Project Overview

![quattro research logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Logo_placeholder_image.png/600px-Logo_placeholder_image.png)

Founded in **2004**, **quattro research** develops intuitive software that empowers digital scientific workflows. Their **Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS)** — such as **quattro/CM**, **quattro/LJ**, and **quattro/BR** — manage and analyze complex chemical and biological data.

---

![Team Collaboration](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1632179002215-f5c8d5dcf35b)

To scale quickly and meet growing client demand, quattro research partnered with **unicrew** to strengthen their engineering team with skilled developers who could integrate seamlessly and boost project velocity.

---

## 🚧 Key Challenges

![Challenges](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1573164713347-df1e1f69a3f2)

- **Scalability Requirements** – Needed to scale fast without lowering code quality.
- **Complex UI Needs** – Required a responsive UI for large molecular datasets.
- **Scientific Data Presentation** – Flexible visualization in dynamic grids and forms.
- **Modern Security Protocols** – Needed secure access management (OAuth, JWT).
- **High-Performance Rendering** – For complex molecule structure visualization.

---

## ✅ Solution

### 🔹 React-Based UI

![React UI](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581091012184-5c2bca6f3bb6)

Designed and implemented a performant, intuitive React frontend for handling complex molecule data structures.

---

### 🔹 Configurable Data Framework

![Grid System](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1645051915681-183d5f30ef0a)

Developed a flexible framework allowing scientists to customize data views using dynamic **grids** and **forms**.

---

### 🔹 Secure Authentication

![Security](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:720/format:webp/0*PRZcNPDVe2z5n7kO)

Integrated **OAuth** and **JWT** for robust and modern authentication & authorization standards.

---

### 🔹 Molecule Visualization

![Molecule Viewer](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:720/format:webp/0*PRZcNPDVe2z5n7kO)

Delivered advanced visualization tools for rendering large and complex molecule structures efficiently.

---

## 👥 Collaboration Snapshot

![Unicrew Team](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581091870622-df42a3f9808b)

**unicrew** assembled a full-stack development team with expertise in:
- `.NET`, `Java`, `PHP`, `Laravel`
- `JavaScript`, `React`, `Vue`

They worked in **agile sprints** alongside quattro research’s internal team to maintain alignment, speed, and flexibility.

---

## 🎯 Results

![Success](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581093588401-99a6f43db2a9)

- **⚡ Faster Development** – Accelerated product delivery timelines.
- **🎨 Better Usability** – UI tailored for scientific users.
- **🔐 Improved Security** – OAuth and JWT integration.
- **🔬 Enhanced Visualization** – Clarity in molecule data exploration.
- **🤝 Ongoing Partnership** – Sustained collaboration with quattro research.

---

> _"unicrew's developers integrated seamlessly with our team, demonstrating professionalism and a deep understanding of our needs. Their contributions have been invaluable."_  
> — **Dr. Bernhard Schirm**, Managing Director

news_items.title: How Leading Brands Succeed with Digital Commerce?
news_items.author: John Smith
news_items.content:

## 🎯 Results

- **🔬 Enhanced Visualization** – Clarity in molecule data exploration.

---

> _"unicrew's developers integrated seamlessly with our team, demonstrating professionalism and a deep understanding of our needs. Their contributions have been invaluable."_  
> — **Dr. Bernhard Schirm**, Managing Director

news_items.title: Real Impact with Solid Tech
news_items.author: John Smith
news_items.content:
## 🧪 Project Overview

![quattro research logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Logo_placeholder_image.png/600px-Logo_placeholder_image.png)

Founded in **2004**, **quattro research** develops intuitive software that empowers digital scientific workflows. Their **Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS)** — such as **quattro/CM**, **quattro/LJ**, and **quattro/BR** — manage and analyze complex chemical and biological data.

---

![Team Collaboration](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1632179002215-f5c8d5dcf35b)

To scale quickly and meet growing client demand, quattro research partnered with **unicrew** to strengthen their engineering team with skilled developers who could integrate seamlessly and boost project velocity.

---

## 🚧 Key Challenges

![Challenges](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1573164713347-df1e1f69a3f2)

- **Scalability Requirements** – Needed to scale fast without lowering code quality.
- **Complex UI Needs** – Required a responsive UI for large molecular datasets.
- **Scientific Data Presentation** – Flexible visualization in dynamic grids and forms.
- **Modern Security Protocols** – Needed secure access management (OAuth, JWT).
- **High-Performance Rendering** – For complex molecule structure visualization.

---

## ✅ Solution

### 🔹 React-Based UI

![React UI](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581091012184-5c2bca6f3bb6)

Designed and implemented a performant, intuitive React frontend for handling complex molecule data structures.

---

### 🔹 Configurable Data Framework

![Grid System](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1645051915681-183d5f30ef0a)

Developed a flexible framework allowing scientists to customize data views using dynamic **grids** and **forms**.

---

### 🔹 Secure Authentication

![Security](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:720/format:webp/0*PRZcNPDVe2z5n7kO)

Integrated **OAuth** and **JWT** for robust and modern authentication & authorization standards.

---

### 🔹 Molecule Visualization

![Molecule Viewer](https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:720/format:webp/0*PRZcNPDVe2z5n7kO)

Delivered advanced visualization tools for rendering large and complex molecule structures efficiently.

---

## 👥 Collaboration Snapshot

![Unicrew Team](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581091870622-df42a3f9808b)

**unicrew** assembled a full-stack development team with expertise in:
- `.NET`, `Java`, `PHP`, `Laravel`
- `JavaScript`, `React`, `Vue`

They worked in **agile sprints** alongside quattro research’s internal team to maintain alignment, speed, and flexibility.

---

## 🎯 Results

![Success](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581093588401-99a6f43db2a9)

- **⚡ Faster Development** – Accelerated product delivery timelines.
- **🎨 Better Usability** – UI tailored for scientific users.
- **🔐 Improved Security** – OAuth and JWT integration.
- **🔬 Enhanced Visualization** – Clarity in molecule data exploration.
- **🤝 Ongoing Partnership** – Sustained collaboration with quattro research.

---

> _"unicrew's developers integrated seamlessly with our team, demonstrating professionalism and a deep understanding of our needs. Their contributions have been invaluable."_  
> — **Dr. Bernhard Schirm**, Managing Director

news_items.description: Is Android 15 released?  Various developer previews and beta versions of Android 15 have been released so far. The final launch is

news_items.title: This new IDE from Google is an absolute game changer
news_items.author: John Smith
news_items.content:
## What’s new with Android 15?
Android 15 introduces enhanced privacy controls, new APIs for better performance and user experience, and advanced camera features like **Low Light Boost**. It also deprecates older technologies like **WebSQL**, making way for more modern solutions like **IndexedDB**.
## Is Android 15 released?
Various developer previews and beta versions of Android 15 have been released so far. The final launch is expected to occur sometime in the **fall of 2024**.

## How does Android 15 address app compatibility and backward compatibility issues?
Android 15 includes several measures to ensure app compatibility and backward compatibility, such as:
- Detailed documentation on behavior changes
- New feature support
- Tools like the **Android Compatibility Test Suite (CTS)**

These ensure that apps remain functional and performant on the new platform while still supporting older versions where necessary.

## What are the benefits of the improved camera APIs in Android 15 for app developers?
The improved camera APIs provide:
- Greater control over camera hardware
- Real-time effects
- Improved HDR processing
- Better integration with machine learning algorithms

These capabilities help developers create advanced camera experiences like:

- Augmented reality applications
- Advanced photo/video editing features
## How does Android 15 improve app performance on older devices?
Android 15 offers:
- Optimized memory management
- Enhanced rendering pipelines

These improvements ensure apps run smoothly even on devices with limited hardware resources.

---

## References

- [First Android 15 Developer Preview](https://android-developers.googleblog.com/2024/02/first-developer-preview-android15.html)
- [Android 15 Features Overview](https://developer.android.com/about/versions/15/features)
- [Android Developers Blog](https://android-developers.googleblog.com)
- [Android Developers Official Site](https://developer.android.com)
